template.template: Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX
template.name: Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX
template.description:
The template to monitor Apache ActiveMQ by Zabbix that work without any external scripts. The metrics are collected by JMX. You can set macro values and add macros with context for specific brokers or destinations following macro description.
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/411049-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-amq
Template tooling version used: 0.38

item_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Consumers count total on {#JMXBROKERNAME}
item_prototype.description: Number of consumers attached to the broker of this destination. Used to suppress destination's triggers when the count of consumers on the broker is lower than threshold.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Producers count total on {#JMXBROKERNAME}
item_prototype.description: Number of producers attached to the broker of this destination. Used to suppress destination's triggers when the count of producers on the broker is lower than threshold.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Consumers count
item_prototype.description: Number of consumers attached to this destination.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Messages dequeue rate
item_prototype.description: Rate of messages that has been acknowledged (and removed) from the destination.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Messages enqueue rate
item_prototype.description: Rate of messages that have been sent to the destination.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Expired messages count
item_prototype.description: Number of messages that have been expired.

trigger_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Expired messages count higher than {$ACTIVEMQ.EXPIRIED.WARN:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.description: This metric represents the number of messages that expired before they could be delivered. If you expect all messages to be delivered and acknowledged within a certain amount of time, you can set an expiration for each message, and investigate if your ExpiredCount metric rises above zero.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Memory usage in percents
item_prototype.description: The percentage of the memory limit used.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Producers count
item_prototype.description: Number of producers attached to this destination.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Queue size
item_prototype.description: Number of messages on this destination, including any that have been dispatched but not acknowledged.

trigger_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Queue size higher than {$ACTIVEMQ.QUEUE.WARN:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"} for {$ACTIVEMQ.QUEUE.TIME:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.description: Queue size is higher than threshold. It may indicate performance problems.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX:jmx[{#JMXOBJ},ConsumerCount].max({$ACTIVEMQ.DESTINATION.CONSUMERS.MIN.TIME:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"})}<{$ACTIVEMQ.DESTINATION.CONSUMERS.MIN.HIGH:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"} and {Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX:jmx["org.apache.activemq:type=Broker,brokerName={#JMXBROKERNAME}",{$ACTIVEMQ.TOTAL.CONSUMERS.COUNT: "{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"}].last()}>{$ACTIVEMQ.BROKER.CONSUMERS.MIN.HIGH:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Consumers count is too low (below {$ACTIVEMQ.DESTINATION.CONSUMERS.MIN.HIGH:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"} for {$ACTIVEMQ.DESTINATION.CONSUMERS.MIN.TIME:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"})

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX:jmx[{#JMXOBJ},EnqueueCount].avg({$ACTIVEMQ.MSG.RATE.WARN.TIME:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"})}>{Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX:jmx[{#JMXOBJ},DequeueCount].avg({$ACTIVEMQ.MSG.RATE.WARN.TIME:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"})}
trigger_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Message enqueue rate is higher than dequeue rate for {$ACTIVEMQ.MSG.RATE.WARN.TIME:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.description: Enqueue rate is higher than dequeue rate. It may indicate performance problems.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX:jmx[{#JMXOBJ},ProducerCount].max({$ACTIVEMQ.DESTINATION.PRODUCERS.MIN.TIME:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"})}<{$ACTIVEMQ.DESTINATION.PRODUCERS.MIN.HIGH:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"} and {Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX:jmx["org.apache.activemq:type=Broker,brokerName={#JMXBROKERNAME}",{$ACTIVEMQ.TOTAL.PRODUCERS.COUNT: "{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"}].last()}>{$ACTIVEMQ.BROKER.PRODUCERS.MIN.HIGH:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.name: {#JMXBROKERNAME}: {#JMXDESTINATIONTYPE} {#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}: Producers count is too low (below {$ACTIVEMQ.DESTINATION.PRODUCERS.MIN.HIGH:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"} for {$ACTIVEMQ.DESTINATION.PRODUCERS.MIN.TIME:"{#JMXDESTINATIONNAME}"})

item.host: Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX
Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX
Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX
Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX
Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Version
item_prototype.description: The version of the broker.

trigger_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Version has been changed
trigger_prototype.description: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME} version has changed. Ack to close.

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Memory limit
item_prototype.description: Memory limit, in bytes, used for holding undelivered messages before paging to temporary storage.

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Memory usage in percents
item_prototype.description: Percent of memory limit used.

trigger_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Memory usage is too high (over {$ACTIVEMQ.MEM.MAX.WARN:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}%)

dependency.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Memory usage is too high (over {$ACTIVEMQ.MEM.MAX.HIGH:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}%)

trigger_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Memory usage is too high (over {$ACTIVEMQ.MEM.MAX.HIGH:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}%)

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Storage limit
item_prototype.description: Disk limit, in bytes, used for persistent messages before producers are blocked.

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Storage usage in percents
item_prototype.description: Percent of store limit used.

trigger_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Storage usage is too high (over {$ACTIVEMQ.STORE.MAX.WARN:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}%)

dependency.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Storage usage is too high (over {$ACTIVEMQ.STORE.MAX.HIGH:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}%)

trigger_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Storage usage is too high (over {$ACTIVEMQ.STORE.MAX.HIGH:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}%)

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Temp limit
item_prototype.description: Disk limit, in bytes, used for non-persistent messages and temporary data before producers are blocked.

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Temp usage in percents
item_prototype.description: Percent of temp limit used.

trigger_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Temp usage is too high (over {$ACTIVEMQ.TEMP.MAX.WARN:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}%)

dependency.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Temp usage is too high (over {$ACTIVEMQ.TEMP.MAX.WARN:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}%)

trigger_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Temp usage is too high (over {$ACTIVEMQ.TEMP.MAX.WARN:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}%)

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Consumers count total
item_prototype.description: Number of consumers attached to this broker.

trigger_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Consumers count is too low (below {$ACTIVEMQ.BROKER.CONSUMERS.MIN.HIGH:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"} for {$ACTIVEMQ.BROKER.CONSUMERS.MIN.TIME:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"})

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Messages dequeue rate
item_prototype.description: Rate of messages that have been delivered by the broker and acknowledged by consumers.

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Messages enqueue rate
item_prototype.description: Rate of messages that have been sent to the broker.

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Producers count total
item_prototype.description: Number of producers attached to this broker.

trigger_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Producers count is too low (below {$ACTIVEMQ.BROKER.PRODUCERS.MIN.HIGH:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"} for {$ACTIVEMQ.BROKER.PRODUCERS.MIN.TIME:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"})

item_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Uptime
item_prototype.description: The uptime of the broker.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX:jmx[{#JMXOBJ},TotalEnqueueCount].avg({$ACTIVEMQ.MSG.RATE.WARN.TIME:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"})}>{Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX:jmx[{#JMXOBJ},TotalEnqueueCount].avg({$ACTIVEMQ.MSG.RATE.WARN.TIME:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"})}
trigger_prototype.name: Broker {#JMXBROKERNAME}: Message enqueue rate is higher than dequeue rate for {$ACTIVEMQ.MSG.RATE.WARN.TIME:"{#JMXBROKERNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.description: Enqueue rate is higher than dequeue rate. It may indicate performance problems.

item.host: Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX

Template App Apache ActiveMQ by JMX

macro.description: Minimum amount of consumers for broker. Can be used with broker name as context.
Time during which there may be no consumers on destination. Can be used with broker name as context.
Minimum amount of producers for broker. Can be used with broker name as context.
Time during which there may be no producers on broker. Can be used with broker name as context.
Minimum amount of consumers for destination. Can be used with destination name as context.
Time during which there may be no consumers in destination. Can be used with destination name as context.
Minimum amount of producers for destination. Can be used with destination name as context.
Time during which there may be no producers on destination. Can be used with destination name as context.
Threshold for expiried messages count. Can be used with destination name as context.
Filter of discoverable discovered brokers
Filter to exclude discovered brokers
Filter of discoverable discovered destinations
Filter to exclude discovered destinations
Memory threshold for HIGH trigger. Can be used with destination or broker name as context.
Memory threshold for AVERAGE trigger. Can be used with destination or broker name as context.
Time during which the metric can be above the threshold. Can be used with destination or broker name as context.
The time for message enqueue/dequeue rate. Can be used with destination or broker name as context.
Password for JMX
Port for JMX
Use this to disable alerting for specific destination. 1 = enabled, 0 = disabled. Can be used with destination name as context.
Time during which the QueueSize can be higher than threshold. Can be used with destination name as context.
Threshold for QueueSize. Can be used with destination name as context.
Storage threshold for HIGH trigger. Can be used with broker name as context.
Storage threshold for AVERAGE trigger. Can be used with broker name as context.
Time during which the metric can be above the threshold. Can be used with destination or broker name as context.
Temp threshold for HIGH trigger. Can be used with broker name as context.
Temp threshold for AVERAGE trigger. Can be used with broker name as context.
Time during which the metric can be above the threshold. Can be used with destination or broker name as context.
Attribute for TotalConsumerCount per destination. Used to suppress destination's triggers when the count of consumers on the broker is lower than threshold.
Attribute for TotalProducerCount per destination. Used to suppress destination's triggers when the count of consumers on the broker is lower than threshold.
User for JMX
